entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 9.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 6:00 AM MST Thursday 11 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Widespread smoke becoming local smoke early this morning. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 11 May 2023
